detectors.description: ClassyCoin () has incorrect ERC20 function interface:token.transfer(address,uint256) ()

owned.transferOwnership(address) () should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner ()

[owned.transferOwnership(address)]() should emit an event for: 
	- [owner = newOwner]()

detectors.description:

	- buyPrice = newBuyPrice ()

detectors.description:

detectors.description: Contract owned () is not in CapWords
Parameter token.approve(address,uint256)._value () is not in mixedCase

Parameter token.transfer(address,uint256)._value () is not in mixedCase
Parameter ClassyCoin.transfer(address,uint256)._to () is not in mixedCase

Reentrancy in ClassyCoin.sell(uint256) ():
	External calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(amount * sellPrice) ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Transfer(msg.sender,this,amount) ()

Reentrancy in [ClassyCoin.sell(uint256)]():

	- [! msg.sender.send(amount * sellPrice)]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [Transfer(msg.sender,this,amount)]()
